original_text: Then you shall bring Aaron and his sons to the entrance of the tent of meeting and shall wash them with water
korean_text: 너는 또 아론과 그 아들들을 회막 문으로 데려다가 물로 씻기고

sentences.original_text: Then you shall bring Aaron and his sons
to the entrance of the tent of meeting
and shall wash them with water
